name: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimension
storyline:
Prepare to embark on a photorealistic journey inspired by the eerie world of the Backrooms. Shapeshifters abducted Irish when he was just a child, and now, having reached his 21st birthday, he has uncovered the truth about his "false family." Are you ready for set to begin an extraordinary journey through various dimensions?

SG Studios intends to develop new updates over time and introduce new game modes. One of the highlights of Backrooms: Between Lost Dimensions is the story mode, which showcases the warm commitment to the development of the title. For the first time, Backrooms will receive story cinematics, further expanding the narrative.
summary: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimensions is a horror game that immerses you in the surreal world of the Backrooms. Trapped in an endless maze of monotonous rooms, you must solve disturbing puzzles and face sinister creatures to find an escape. Is your escape just an illusion?
